assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Concept of the project and project management; difference between a project and a process. Strategic planning. Project organisation. Defining the scope. Setting the project objectives and goals. Describing the current situation and problem analysis. Defining the solutions in the context. Creating project charter. Drafting the project. GROW method. The Logical Framework method. Planning activities and resources. Gantt chart. PERT diagram. SWOT analysis. Risk assessment methodologies and handling project change and issues. Agile project management basics. Planning the budget. Planning the internal communications. Executing the project. Monitoring and controlling the project. Managing and motivating the team. Closing the project.
description.et: Projekti olemus, projekti ja protsessi erinevused. Strateegiline planeerimine. Projekti organisatsioon. Projekti skoop. Projekti eesmärgistamine. Olukorra kirjeldamine ja probleemide analüüs. Lahenduste leidmine. Projekti kavandamine. GROW meetod. Loogilise maatriksi meetod. Tegevuste ja ressursside planeerimine. Gantti kaart. PERTi diagramm. SWOT analüüs. Riskide hindamise metoodikad, projekti muudatuste ja probleemidega toimetulek. Agiilsed projektijuhtimise meetodid. Eelarve planeerimine. Sisekommunikatsiooni planeerimine. Projekti täideviimine. Projekti kontrollimine ja jälgimine. Meeskonna juhtimise ja motiveerimise põhialused. Projekti lõpetamine.

objectives.en: Theoretical overview on the essence of projects and their management as well as practical skills for planning and implementation of the projects.
objectives.et: Teoreetiline ülevaade projektide ning nende juhtimise olemusest ning praktilised oskused projektide kavandamiseks ja elluviimiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: - knows terms and structure of the project;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab projektitööga seonduvaid mõisteid ja projekti ülesehitust;

learning_outcomes.en: - can analyze the need for the project, set the goals, plan project activities, tasks and resources as well as set the budget and write the report;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab analüüsida projekti vajadust, püstitada eesmärke, planeerida tegevusi, koostada eelarvet ja aruannet;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the basic tools for the internal communication of the project;
- knows the key motivators when managing the team;
- can define and analyse the key risks for the project and knows how to solve most frequent issues;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab analüüsida projekti ohukohti ning tunneb levinumate ohukohtade lahendusi;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to use different problem solving techniques;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab ja oskab rakendada erinevaid loovtehnikaid lahenduste leidmisel;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows how to close the project.
